name: Odd Woods
description:
EXPLORE

Explore a living dense forest from abandoned camps to caves.

BUILD

Use daytime to gather resources and prepare your base for the night.

SURVIVE THE NIGHT

Try to withstand the attacks of horror creatures in the night. You will face more numerous and stronger enemies every night.

HUNT

Stay fed and hydrated by hunting wildlife and finding fresh water.

PLANT

Maintain a balanced diet of proteins and carbs. Since carbs are rarely found in the forest, you have to grow them yourself by planting vegetables.
